name: The Queens Number
summary: Congratulations! You're the winner of a 20 million dollar jackpot! With this money, you will destroy the hotel that corrupted your father and return his wedding ring that he had pawned off... but what you didn't expect was a maze of mysteries. In Las Vegas, the city that never sleeps, four men appear before you. Friendship, love, and Lucyd Hotel's deadly secret! Will you be able to get the ring back?
